select rp.id,rp.siteMark,rp.siteName,rp.areaCode,rp.areaName,rp.roomCode,rp.roomName, DATE_FORMAT(rd.startTime, '%H:%i') startTimeStr,DATE_FORMAT(rd.endTime, '%H:%i') endTimeStr,rp.orderNum from reserve_manage_playroom rp left JOIN (SELECT * from reserve_manage_date where DATE_FORMAT(startTime, '%Y-%m-%d')= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') and status=0) rd on(rp.id=rd.PlayroomId) where rp.siteMark=#{siteMark} and rp.areaCode=#{areaCode}
order by rp.orderNum
select DISTINCT a.siteMark,a.siteName,a.areaCode,a.areaName from reserve_manage_playroom a where a.siteMark=#{siteMark}

SELECT rd.id,rp.siteMark,rp.siteName,rp.areaCode,rp.areaName,rp.roomCode,rp.roomName,rd.userName, rd.userphone, DATE_FORMAT(rd.startTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') startTimeStr, DATE_FORMAT(rd.endTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') endTimeStr, rd.updateTime, rd.status from reserve_manage_playroom rp,reserve_manage_date rd where rp.id=#{id} and rp.id = rd.PlayroomId and DATE_FORMAT(startTime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') and rd.status in (0,2) order by startTimeStr
select * from reserve_manage_permission order by createTime desc
select count(*) from om_employee oe,om_organization oo where oe.ORGID=oo.ORGID and oo.orgcode='W0000033986' and oe.empcode=#{userNo}
select count(*) from reserve_manage_permission a where a.userNo=#{userNo}
